General.Name: ecotel communication ag
General.Description: ecotel communication ag provides marketing information and telecommunication solutions in Germany. The company operates through ecotel Business Customers, ecotel Wholesale, and Nacamar segments. The ecotel Business Customers segment offers voice and data services; and products as a supplier for other ICT companies. The ecotel Wholesale Solutions segment provides cross-network trading services in telephone minutes and marketing data lines for national and international carriers. The Nacamar segment provides content delivery network streaming services for media companies. ecotel communication ag was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Düsseldorf, Germany.

1.Name: Mr. Peter  Zils
1.Title: Founder, Deputy CEO & Co-Chairman of Management Board

2.Name: Mr. Achim  Theis
2.Title: Chief Commercial Officer & Member of Management Board
